item.title: Favorite books 2021
item.description: Ryusho Kadota, Akira Tokuhiro, Simon Varnam: On the brink: The inside story of Fukushima Daiichi. Merlin Sheldrake: Entangled life: How fungi make our worlds, change our minds & shape our futures. Becky Chambers: Long way to a small angry planet. Kim Stanley Robinson: The ministry for the future. Brian Cox: The planets. Scott Kelly: Endurance: A year in space, a lifetime of discovery.
